basic.description: This course is required of all doctoral performance majors. Alternative modes of fulfilling MVK 6989 requirements are: concerto recital program with large instrumental ensemble, performance with large chamber ensemble, informal reading, performance of a major operatic role with orchestral accompaniment, conducting performance, and approved off-campus performance.
basic.subject: MVK
basic.title: Doctoral Recital: Performance of Major Work with Large Ensemble            Accompaniment
